intro: Gnaphalium acilepis, commonly known as the slender leaf everlasting, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant produces small, clustered yellow flowers that are often surrounded by pale green bracts. It is typically found in arid or semi-arid environments, thriving in well-drained soils. Gnaphalium acilepis is often used in floral arrangements due to its long-lasting blooms and delicate appearance.
